summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Traffic Signal Controller. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with excellent visual design and responsive layout. Found critical UI overlay issue preventing manual button clicks without force, and intermittent 502 errors during automatic updates.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: 502 Bad Gateway errors during automatic polling
flaky_endpoints.impact: Affects automatic traffic updates in frontend

ui_bugs.issue: Buttons not clickable due to overlay interference from intersection center elements

integration_issues.impact: Occasional failure to update traffic data automatically

passed_tests: Splash screen appears for 3 seconds with correct title
4-way intersection displays correctly with all directions
Traffic lights show proper red/green states with glowing effects
Vehicle counts display and update correctly (0-50 range)
AI logic prioritizes direction with highest vehicle count
Current Status panel shows active green signal correctly
AI Decision explanations appear and update with intelligent text
Cycle counter increments and displays correctly
AI Insights History table populates with timestamped decisions
Manual Mode toggle enables/disables manual control
Manual signal control buttons appear in manual mode
Manual control changes active signal (with force click)
Reset button clears simulation and resets counters
Responsive design works on tablet and mobile screen sizes
All backend API endpoints return correct responses
Backend handles invalid requests with proper error codes
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix CSS z-index/positioning issue causing manual control buttons to be blocked by intersection center overlay elements. Investigate intermittent 502 errors on /api/traffic/update endpoint during automatic polling.
